paper.title: DARE: Domain analysis and reuse environment

author.org: Software Engineering Guild, 400 Drew Ct., Sterling, VA 20165, USA#TAB#
Ruben Prieto‐Diaz Reuse Inc., 12365 Washington Brice Road, Fairfax, VA 22033, USA#TAB#

paper.publisher: J. C. Baltzer AG, Science Publishers
paper.abstract: DARE (Domain Analysis and Reuse Environment) is a CASE tool that supports domain analysis â€“ the activity of identifying and documenting the commonalities and variabilities in related software systems. DARE supports the capture of domain information from experts, documents, and code in a domain. Captured domain information is stored in a domain book that will typically contain a generic architecture for the domain and domaindspecific reusable components.
